trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Configuring Workday for Inbound Synchronization | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Configuring Workday for Inbound Synchronization | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Workday as source of identity data for Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Workday as source of identity data for Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Configuring Workday for Inbound Synchronization
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Configuring Workday for Inbound Synchronization

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=521880).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=521880).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show you the steps you need to perform in Workday and Azure AD to import people from Workday to Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show you the steps you need to perform in Workday and Azure AD to import people from Workday to Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure AD Premium subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure AD Premium subscription

trans-unit.source: A tenant in Workday
trans-unit.target: A tenant in Workday

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Workday
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Workday

trans-unit.source: Creating an integration system user
trans-unit.target: Creating an integration system user

trans-unit.source: Creating a security group
trans-unit.target: Creating a security group

trans-unit.source: Assigning the integration system user to the security group
trans-unit.target: Assigning the integration system user to the security group

trans-unit.source: Configuring security group options
trans-unit.target: Configuring security group options

trans-unit.source: Activating security policy changes
trans-unit.target: Activating security policy changes

trans-unit.source: Configuring user import in Azure AD
trans-unit.target: Configuring user import in Azure AD

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Workday
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Workday

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Workday.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Workday.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for Workday, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for Workday, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type **Workday**.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type **Workday**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select Workday, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select Workday, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: Application gallery
trans-unit.target: Application gallery

trans-unit.source: Creating an integration system user
trans-unit.target: Creating an integration system user

trans-unit.source: In the **Workday Workbench**, enter create user in the search box, and then click **Create Integration System User**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Workday Workbench**, enter create user in the search box, and then click **Create Integration System User**.

trans-unit.source: ![Create user](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750979.png "Create user")
trans-unit.target: ![Create user](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750979.png "Create user")

trans-unit.source: Complete the **Create Integration System User** task by supplying a user name and password for a new Integration System User.
trans-unit.target: Complete the **Create Integration System User** task by supplying a user name and password for a new Integration System User.

trans-unit.source: Leave the Require New Password at Next Sign In option unchecked, because this user will be logging on programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Leave the Require New Password at Next Sign In option unchecked, because this user will be logging on programmatically.

trans-unit.source: Leave the Session Timeout Minutes with its default value of 0, which will prevent the user’s sessions from timing out prematurely.
trans-unit.target: Leave the Session Timeout Minutes with its default value of 0, which will prevent the user’s sessions from timing out prematurely.

trans-unit.source: ![Create Integration System User](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750980.png "Create Integration System User")
trans-unit.target: ![Create Integration System User](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750980.png "Create Integration System User")

trans-unit.source: Creating a security group
trans-unit.target: Creating a security group

trans-unit.source: For the scenario outlined in this tutorial, you need to create an unconstrained integration system security group and assign the user to it.
trans-unit.target: For the scenario outlined in this tutorial, you need to create an unconstrained integration system security group and assign the user to it.

trans-unit.source: Enter create security group in the search box, and then click **Create Security Group**.
trans-unit.target: Enter create security group in the search box, and then click **Create Security Group**.

trans-unit.source: ![CreateSecurity Group](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750981.png "CreateSecurity Group")
trans-unit.target: ![CreateSecurity Group](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750981.png "CreateSecurity Group")

trans-unit.source: Complete the Create Security Group task.
trans-unit.target: Complete the Create Security Group task.

trans-unit.source: Select Integration System Security Group—Unconstrained from the Type of Tenanted Security Group dropdown, to create a security group to which members will be explicitly added.
trans-unit.target: Select Integration System Security Group—Unconstrained from the Type of Tenanted Security Group dropdown, to create a security group to which members will be explicitly added.

trans-unit.source: CreateSecurity Group
trans-unit.target: CreateSecurity Group

trans-unit.source: Assigning the integration system user to the security group
trans-unit.target: Assigning the integration system user to the security group

trans-unit.source: Enter edit security group in the search box, and then click **Edit Security Group**.
trans-unit.target: Enter edit security group in the search box, and then click **Edit Security Group**.

trans-unit.source: ![Edit Security Group](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750983.png "Edit Security Group")
trans-unit.target: ![Edit Security Group](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750983.png "Edit Security Group")

trans-unit.source: Search for, and select the new integration security group by name.
trans-unit.target: Search for, and select the new integration security group by name.

trans-unit.source: Edit Security Group
trans-unit.target: Edit Security Group

trans-unit.source: Edit Security Group
trans-unit.target: Edit Security Group

trans-unit.source: Add the new integration system user to the new security group.
trans-unit.target: Add the new integration system user to the new security group.

trans-unit.source: System Security Group
trans-unit.target: System Security Group

trans-unit.source: Configuring security group options
trans-unit.target: Configuring security group options

trans-unit.source: In this step, you grant to the new security group permissions for **Get** and **Put** operations on the objects secured by the following domain security policies:
trans-unit.target: In this step, you grant to the new security group permissions for **Get** and **Put** operations on the objects secured by the following domain security policies:

trans-unit.source: External Account Provisioning
trans-unit.target: External Account Provisioning

trans-unit.source: Worker Data: Public Worker Reports
trans-unit.target: Worker Data: Public Worker Reports

trans-unit.source: Worker Data: All Positions
trans-unit.target: Worker Data: All Positions

trans-unit.source: Worker Data: Current Staffing Information
trans-unit.target: Worker Data: Current Staffing Information

trans-unit.source: Worker Data: Business Title on Worker Profile
trans-unit.target: Worker Data: Business Title on Worker Profile

trans-unit.source: Enter domain security policies in the search box, and then click on the link, Domain Security Policies for Functional Area.
trans-unit.target: Enter domain security policies in the search box, and then click on the link, Domain Security Policies for Functional Area.

trans-unit.source: Domain Security Policies
trans-unit.target: Domain Security Policies

trans-unit.source: Search for system and select the **System** functional area.
trans-unit.target: Search for system and select the **System** functional area.

trans-unit.source: Click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: ![Domain Security Policies](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750987.png "Domain Security Policies")
trans-unit.target: ![Domain Security Policies](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750987.png "Domain Security Policies")

trans-unit.source: In the list of security policies for the System functional area, expand Security Administration and select the domain security policy, External Account Provisioning.
trans-unit.target: In the list of security policies for the System functional area, expand Security Administration and select the domain security policy, External Account Provisioning.

trans-unit.source: Domain Security Policies
trans-unit.target: Domain Security Policies

trans-unit.source: Click **Edit Permissions**, and then, on the **Edit Permissions**dialog page, add the new security group to the list of security groups with **Get** and **Put** integration permissions.
trans-unit.target: Click **Edit Permissions**, and then, on the **Edit Permissions**dialog page, add the new security group to the list of security groups with **Get** and **Put** integration permissions.

trans-unit.source: ![Edit Permission](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750989.png "Edit Permission")
trans-unit.target: ![Edit Permission](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750989.png "Edit Permission")

trans-unit.source: Repeat step 1, above, to return to the screen for selecting functional areas, and this time, search for staffing, select the Staffing functional area, and click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Repeat step 1, above, to return to the screen for selecting functional areas, and this time, search for staffing, select the Staffing functional area, and click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: ![Domain Security Policies](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750990.png "Domain Security Policies")
trans-unit.target: ![Domain Security Policies](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750990.png "Domain Security Policies")

trans-unit.source: In the list of security policies for the Staffing functional area, expand Worker Data: Staffing, and repeat step 4 above for each of these remaining security policies:
trans-unit.target: In the list of security policies for the Staffing functional area, expand Worker Data: Staffing, and repeat step 4 above for each of these remaining security policies:

trans-unit.source: Worker Data: Public Worker Reports
trans-unit.target: Worker Data: Public Worker Reports

trans-unit.source: Worker Data: All Positions
trans-unit.target: Worker Data: All Positions

trans-unit.source: Worker Data: Current Staffing Information
trans-unit.target: Worker Data: Current Staffing Information

trans-unit.source: Worker Data: Business Title on Worker Profile
trans-unit.target: Worker Data: Business Title on Worker Profile

trans-unit.source: Domain Security Policies
trans-unit.target: Domain Security Policies

trans-unit.source: Activating security policy changes
trans-unit.target: Activating security policy changes

trans-unit.source: Enter activate in the search box, and then click on the link,Activate Pending Security Policy Changes.
trans-unit.target: Enter activate in the search box, and then click on the link,Activate Pending Security Policy Changes.

trans-unit.source: Activate
trans-unit.target: Activate

trans-unit.source: Begin the Activate Pending Security Policy Changes task by entering a comment for auditing purposes, and then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Begin the Activate Pending Security Policy Changes task by entering a comment for auditing purposes, and then click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: ![Activate Pending Security](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750993.png "Activate Pending Security")
trans-unit.target: ![Activate Pending Security](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750993.png "Activate Pending Security")

trans-unit.source: Complete the task on the next screen by checking the checkbox labelled Confirm, and then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Complete the task on the next screen by checking the checkbox labelled Confirm, and then click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: ![Activate Pending Security](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750994.png "Activate Pending Security")
trans-unit.target: ![Activate Pending Security](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750994.png "Activate Pending Security")

trans-unit.source: Configuring user import in Azure AD
trans-unit.target: Configuring user import in Azure AD

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to configure Azure AD to import people from Workday.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to configure Azure AD to import people from Workday.

trans-unit.source: To configure user import in Azure AD, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure user import in Azure AD, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: On the **Workday** application integration page, click **Configure user import** to open the **Configure Provisioning** dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the **Workday** application integration page, click **Configure user import** to open the **Configure Provisioning** dialog.

trans-unit.source: 2.On the **Settings and admin credentials** page, perform the following steps, and then click **Next**:
trans-unit.target: 2.On the **Settings and admin credentials** page, perform the following steps, and then click **Next**:

trans-unit.source: ![Settings and admin credentials](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750995.png "Settings and admin credentials")
trans-unit.target: ![Settings and admin credentials](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750995.png "Settings and admin credentials")

trans-unit.source: On the **Test connection** page, click **Start test** to confirm connectivity, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Test connection** page, click **Start test** to confirm connectivity, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: ![Test connection](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750996.png "Test connection")
trans-unit.target: ![Test connection](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750996.png "Test connection")

trans-unit.source: On the **Provisioning** options page, click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Provisioning** options page, click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: ![Provisioning options](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750997.png "Provisioning options")
trans-unit.target: ![Provisioning options](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750997.png "Provisioning options")

trans-unit.source: On the **Start provisioning** dialog, click **Complete**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Start provisioning** dialog, click **Complete**.

trans-unit.source: ![Start provisioning](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750998.png "Start provisioning")
trans-unit.target: ![Start provisioning](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-inbound-tutorial/IC750998.png "Start provisioning")

trans-unit.source: You can now go to the **Users** section and check whether your Workday user has been imported.
trans-unit.target: You can now go to the **Users** section and check whether your Workday user has been imported.
